about_the_game:
You are Juno, a teenage girl getting evidence to clear her brother's name. Choose who helps you solve the mystery. With multiple endings, some scenes are flashbacks to the past. Your actions there may even change who committed the crime, with what, and where!



It's not just the gripping story that will keep you hooked. Luminous Threads takes visual novels to the next level with stunning animations and comic sequences.

Watch Juno's world come to life before your eyes, with dynamic animations that draw you into the heart of the action. And don't miss the thrilling animated story that reveals key story moments and character development in a whole new way.



Every choice matters, shaping your destiny as Juno and whether Kade will be set free. Will you rise to the challenge, outsmart powerful adversaries, and deliver justice? Unleash your inner strength in this thrilling tale of intelligence and resourcefulness.

The threads you choose decide different endings to Juno's story. This is an adventure you will want to revisit again and again.



The story comprises over 100,000 professionally written words.

Uncover a web of lies and corruption as you guide Juno through a thrilling journey of intelligence and resourcefulness. Outsmart powerful adversaries and deliver justice.

Watch Juno's self-worth and determination soar with each obstacle she conquers, inspiring you to unleash your own inner strength and achieve your goals.



Each choice you make pieces together the main story narrative. With each character you encounter, you'll find yourself questioning their motives and loyalties.

Will you trust the enigmatic hacker or the charming detective with a hidden agenda?

The fate of the city - and your brother - hangs in the balance.

So choose wisely, because this is a story of many threads.

Your decisions weave not just the outcome, but the very fabric of the story itself, different each time you play.

VISUAL NOVEL FEATURES

  • Multiple endings: numerous distinct story threads
  • A visually unique art style
  • Exciting comic sequences
  • Over 100k words of professionally written story (over 6 hours' gameplay, depending on your reading speed)
  • Beautiful custom music and audioscape
